decision_conditions: In respect of condition 1 of application reference 23/01976/HOU,The following plans/ details: 01_ 001 Location Plan01_002 Block Plan01_004 Fire Strategy Plan02_001 Existing Ground and Roof Plan02_002 Existing Elevations02_003 Existing Section02_005 Proposed Ground Floor and Roof Plan02_006 Proposed Elevations02_007 Proposed Section Fire Safety StatementFire Safety Strategyare replaced by:01_ 001 Location Plan Rev A01_002 Block Plan Rev A01_004 Fire Strategy Plan Rev A02_001 Existing Ground and Roof Plan Rev A02_002 Existing Elevations Rev A02_003 Existing Section Rev A02_005 Proposed Ground Floor and Roof Plan Rev A02_006 Proposed Elevations Rev A02_007 Proposed Section Rev AFire Safety Statement Issue 2Fire Safety Strategy Issue 2Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 23/01976/HOU (Conversion of existing garage into habitable space, erection of ramp.). Amendment to omit the additional proposed front door and to continue with proposed windows to maximise natural daylight and ventilation into the space.
